ASSISTANT_CONNECTION_FAILED_1: There’s something wrong, and I can’t answer your questions right now. Please try again in a little while.
ASSISTANT_NOT_READY_MESSAGE: Siri is adding new users every day. You will receive an alert when you can start using Siri.
ASSISTANT_CONNECTION_FAILED_3: Something’s amiss… can you check back with me in a little while?
ASSISTANT_TRY_AGAIN: Sorry, could you say that again?
ASSISTANT_NOT_READY_TITLE: You can start using Siri soon.
ASSISTANT_CONNECTION_FAILED_2: Sorry, I’m not able to help you right now. Please try me again in a little while.
ASSISTANT_CONNECTION_FAILED_0: I’m really sorry about this, but I can’t take any requests right now. Please try again in a little while.
